2. Great teamwork and leadership skills. Our project work is done almost exclusively on teams, so it’s critical that our RAs work well with others.
3. Intellectual curiosity and creativity. We are looking for candidates who consistently want to learn more and approach problems with creativity.
4. A high degree of ownership and commitment. Successful RAs are committed to delivering their best work product, taking ownership of their work, and engaging in excellent client services.
